name: Space Game - PC Game
description:
Space Game is a simple classic style space game, control your spaceship and destroy your enemies, really simple. Go back to the simple classic 2D space games with this 2D space game, simple to play,  customize your  keys, shot lasers and bombs to destroy asteroids and other spaceships, face the big mother ships that will throw everything at you Enjoy this classic 2D Space Game

If you like this game and want to show support, the donation is available, also you can donate directly to my Paypal or send me a bitcoin ;)   3PiasfPXF6MhPXcGBbhzYfWxbRZz3h6PEj
